MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold affecting properties in Cefn Road, Celyn Mali Road, Garreg Boeth and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12 noon due to broken equipment on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:42am on 6th January 2021.
